session.title: ILD SW Workshop
session.description:
(Last update: 9 April 2009)

Workshop goal
The purpose of the workshop is to review status and needs for ILD software and start to develop a plan in post-LOI era.

Workshop venue
ILD SW Workshop will be held at KEK, which is about 10 km north of Epochal, Tsukuba Center, where TILC09 is held. The workshop is held at 4th building(Yon-Go-Kan Bldg.), 1st floor seminor room. KEK campus map is available at http://www.kek.jp/intra-e/map/index.html and 4th building is at ZONE-M, M02, Yon-Go-Kan Bldg.

Access to KEK
Access to KEK will be found at http://www.kek.jp/intra-e/access/index.html. The timetable of the local bus will be found at the bottom of the access info. of TILC09, http://tilc09.kek.jp/access.php. English translations of some japanese HERE may be useful for travel in Tsukuba area

WebEx
The workshop will be connected to the WebEx. Please see the instruction for WebEx connection

Wireless Lan at KEK
In order to connect your PC to KEK Lan, please follow the procedure here. It is recommended to register your PC before you come to KEK, if you wish to use PC while in KEK. This procedure is necessary for use in KEK only and not necessary at Epochal.

To speakers
In order to leave enough time for discussions, all speakers are requested to use only a half of allocated time for presentation and leave the rest for discussion.

Convener
Frank Gade (DESY) and Akiya Miyamoto (KEK)

Local contact
Akiya Miyamoto
E-Mail: akiya.miyamoto @ kek.jp
Phone: +81-29-864-5371
